alert.note: Alert for Bossier; Caddo (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 13 at 12:10PM CDT until June 13 at 1:15PM CDT by NWS Shreveport
info.description: The National Weather Service in Shreveport has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Caddo Parish in northwestern Louisiana... West central Bossier Parish in northwestern Louisiana... Marion County in northeastern Texas... Southwestern Cass County in northeastern Texas... Northern Harrison County in northeastern Texas... East central Upshur County in northeastern Texas... Southeastern Morris County in northeastern Texas... * Until 115 PM CDT. * At 1209 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Ore City, or 20 miles east of Gilmer, moving east at 55 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Shreveport, Marshall, Vivian, Greenwood, Blanchard, Waskom, Jefferson, Ore City, Oil City, Mooringsport, Belcher, Gilliam, Lodi, Smithland, Berea, Harleton, Karnack, Woodlawn, Gray and Avinger. * A second severe thunderstorm is leading this one, and it is currently located near the city of Jefferson. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
